entry.title: WIND WARNING , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cowichan 12:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: 9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming light overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
